titles.title: The Great Physician Now Is Near (easy really n

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sweetest note in seraph song Sweetest name on mortal tongue Sweetest carol ever sung Jesus blessed Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Great Physician now is near The sympathizing Jesus He speaks the drooping heart to cheer O hear the voice of Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Your many sins are all forgiven O hear the voice of Jesus Go on your way In peace to heaven And wear a crown with Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All glory to the dying Lamb I now believe in Jesus I love the blessed Savior's name I love the name of Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His name dispels my guilt and fear No other name but Jesus O how my soul delights to hear The precious name of Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And when to that bright world above We rise to be with Jesus We'll sing around the throne of love His name the name of Jesus{/lang-eng}
